name: googlelighthouse
description: Runs Google Lighthouse scan against target URL.
helpMarkDown: Lighthouse is an open-source, automated tool for improving the quality of web pages. Read more [about lighthouse](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/lighthouse/)
author: Gurucharan94

inputs.name: targetURL
inputs.label: URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target URL on which lighthouse scan is run. You can also use variables with the $(MyWebsite) syntax

inputs.name: configFilePath
inputs.label: Path to config file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the lighthouse Json configuration file. Example config files are available [here](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/lighthouse/tree/master/lighthouse-core/config)

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.label: Additional Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Command Line Parameters to Lighthouse CLI. See available options [here](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/lighthouse#cli-options)
